sections.heading: 2-110 through 2-119 of this title shall be the provisions of the Local Government Campaign Finance and Financial Disclosure Act applicable to technology center districts and independent school districts and shall be known as the “Technology Center District and Independent School District Campaign Fi
sections.text: 2-110 through 2-119 of this title shall be the provisions of the Local Government Campaign Finance and Financial Disclosure Act applicable to technology center districts and independent school districts and shall be known as the “Technology Center District and Independent School District Campaign Finance and Financial Disclosure Act”.Added by Laws 2014, c. 313, § 21, eff. Jan. 1, 2015. Amended by Laws 2025, c. 71, § 19, eff. Nov. 1, 2025.
